title: pelimies
author: pelimies
content: BNB TIGER Fierce Firm Victory BNBTiger is the king of beasts. They are the symbol of victory and strength. Powerful and tough.and our $BNBTIGER community is the same.$BNBTIGER is a decentralized experiment, launched on the January 3, 2022, by the founder, BNBTiger9527, as a fresh opportunity for those who were struggling in the midst of the biggest bear market since. Born out of trials and tribulation, the $BNBTIGER community is the strongest community you'll find, supportive of one another, and pushing each other towards success.BNBTiger's ultimate goal is to eliminate all zeros and surpass the historical record of shib!According to historical data of charts BnbTiger has eliminated 4 zeros already in the bear run of whole market as it was started with 21 zeros and price at a moment of writing article is with 17 zeros. It's great Victory of BNBTIGER and Team that they achieved such a goal of 60000% price up in Bear market.   BNBTiger is already listed on 2 of Top 30 exchanges BKEX and Bitmart.As per information revealed BNBTiger team is working to launch DAPP soon including Burn Portal, Nfts Minting feature and Staking feature as well.If the team launch DAPP, according to crypto analysts and most influencers of the crypto market BNBTiger is going to eliminate 3 zeros in near future.You guys can say it will Booommmm in the marketThe team is most energetic and willing to kill zeros in near future.  As per mentioned the historical move of BNBTIGER, I would like to mention that in just month of February, the number of holders increased from 5K to 30K. It's such a huge success for a Meme project which was not listed on any CEX at the moment of creating ATH of 50 Million Diluted Mcap. It was a milestone in the history of MarketSoon BNBTIGER is gonna explode and after DAPP the team is fully ready for listings on Top 10 exchanges. It will be the game changer in market. Let's hope best for Project, Team and Holders.Contract: 0xac68931b666e086e9de380cfdb0fb5704a35dc2dALL SOCIALS:TELEGRAM : https://t.me/BNBTigerENWEBSITE :http://bnbtiger.top/TWITTER : https://twitter.com/bnbtigerCOINMARKETCAP: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/bnbtiger/BitMart: https://www.bitmart.com/trade/en-US?layout=basic&theme=dark&symbol=BNBTIGER%281M%29_USDThttps://www.bkex.com/en/trade/BNBTiger_USDT
